page.title: Newfoundland and Labrador House of Assembly

{{Infobox Parliament | name = Newfoundland and Labrador House of Assembly | coa_pic = | session_room = ConfederationBuildingStJohnsNewfoundland.JPG | house_type = Unicameral | leader1_type = [[Speaker of the House of Assembly of Newfoundland and Labrador|Speaker]] | leader1 = [[Ross Wiseman]] | party1 = [[Progressive Conservative Party of Newfoundland and Labrador|Progressive Conservative]] | election1 = October 27, 2011 | leader2_type = [[Premier of Newfoundland and Labrador|Premier]] | leader2 = [[Kathy Dunderdale]] | party2 = [[Progressive Conservative Party of Newfoundland and Labrador|Progressive Conservative]] | election2 = December 3, 2010 | leader3_type = [[Leader of the Opposition (Newfoundland and Labrador)|Leader of the Opposition]] | leader3 = [[Yvonne Jones]] | party3 = [[Liberal Party of Newfoundland and Labrador|Liberal]] | election3 = 2007 | members = 48 | p_groups = [[Progressive Conservative Party of Newfoundland and Labrador|Progressive Conservative]]
[[Liberal Party of Newfoundland and Labrador|Liberal]]
[[New Democratic Party of Newfoundland and Labrador|New Democratic]] | election6 = October 11, 2011 | meeting_place = [[Colonial Building]] (1850-1959)
[[Confederation Building (Newfoundland and Labrador)|Confederation Building]] (1959- ) | website = [http://www.assembly.nl.ca/ www.assembly.nl.ca/] }} The '''Newfoundland and Labrador House of Assembly''' is one of two components of the '''General Assembly of Newfoundland and Labrador''', the other being the [[Lieutenant-Governor of Newfoundland and Labrador]]. The [[Newfoundland and Labrador]] General Assembly meets in the [[Confederation Building (Newfoundland and Labrador)|Confederation Building]] at [[St. John's, Newfoundland and Labrador|St. John's]]. Worthy of note is the fact that the governing party sits on the left side of the speaker of the House of Assembly as opposed to the traditional right side of the speaker. This tradition dates back to the 1850s because the heaters in the [[Colonial Building]] were located on the left side. Thus, the government chose to sit in the heat, and leave the opposition sitting in the cold. ==Seat standings==
